Presentation.Description: In this session, we'll dig into the latest web standards - HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript with jQuery, and responsive web design. We'll see how to apply some of the web dev features in Visual Studio 2013 shown earlier in the day with real world application. This session extends the GeekQuiz applicaiton by building in a single page application (SPA) interface using Ember.js and CSS3 transitions.
Presentation.Title: Modern Web Front Ends
